briefTitle: Treatment of Patients With Nocturia (Non-PK Study)
officialTitle: A Phase III Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Control, Multicenter Study to Investigate the Efficacy the Efficacy and Safety of SER120 Nasal Spray Formulation in Patients With Nocturia (Non PK Study)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate a treatment of nocturia. The hypothesis is that SER120 will decrease the number of nocturic episodes compared to placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Mean Number of Nocturic Episodes/Night
